data.message: It's the colonel of this eternal inferno puntin chunks outta punks in my Nike dunks.. they claim to be skitzo but they fake the funk...wake up an smell the roses ...I live it..to you it's show bizz...going through delusions talking ta burning bushes like Moses ...the diagnoses is hypnosis.. listening to pink Floyd paranoid smoking roaches... when I focus it's buenas noches to anyone who approaches this atrocious black plague like the locust got magic like hoe kiss.. poke kiss...I'm a dopeboy cokeless the dopest in the dope bizz
